description: The public works and government services is seeking construction supplies and materials for the following part of the Port Edward job : filling of Miles Bay, landscaping. This job is subject to funding approval.
full_summary:

## Tender Notice and Documents
The notice is a two-phase selection process. Phase 1 evaluates the qualifications of all bidders. Phase 2 invites qualified bidders to provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings. Please refer to the attached Request for Qualification (RFQ) documents for detailed information.
